divs: Sighting DetailsWell first of all it was New Years about 12:27 a.m. . i had just walked my girifriend outside and kissed her . as she was aproaching down stairs, she immediately ran back to me ,she said" babe come outside!So i went outside and she said "baqbe look "! So we b9th loooked we saw a bright red light going really slow. it did'nt have the lights as you wuold see on a air plane. It was going south now we are lococated eubank and lomas. going just asd slow as an air plane. Anyways, my girlfriend comes out her apartment as she aproaches my house she see,s another orange bright light going the same direction no noise very silent going the same direction. We wathch it untill it disapeared.
Summary: large orange light traveling n to s speed normal 12:27 another followed
